text: ( Source : Claire McCaskill ) Wednesday, October 21 , 2015 WASHINGTON â€“ U.S. Senator Claire McCaskill today continued her aggressive pursuit of scam artists who target seniors by helping lead a Senate panel examining computer tech-support scams
